thread.section_title: Intrepid Travel Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Intrepid Travel | www.intrepidtravel.com
thread.title: Helen

author: Helen
title: Helen
text:
I have taken many trips with Intrepid and have not once been disappointed. From the moment of contact organizing my new adventure I feel so comfortable and well informed about my chosen destination.
Intrepid have given me the confidence to move outside my comfort zone and to meet and stay in touch with people from all over the world.
The leaders, home stays and the local interaction makes for a real adventure and memories that stay with me long after the trip is over.
